title: Respons Haru Iron Man Tanggapi Captain America Pamit Selamanya dari Avengers
body:
Respons Haru Iron Man Tanggapi Captain America Pamit Selamanya dari Avengers

[ad_1]





Jakarta – Chris Evans belum lama ini mengungkapkan ucapan pamit di momen terakhir ia syuting ‘Avengers 4’. Ucapan itu menjadi pernyataan yang mengejutkan bagi banyak penggemar Avengers di luar sana.

Pamit yang diungkapkan Evans juga ditanggapi oleh sejumlah aktor. Belakangan diketahui tak hanya Ryan Reynolds juga The Rock yang ikut terharu melihat Chris Evans pamit, rekan sesamanya di…

title: Ice to meet you
body:
Serena is thrown into the world of SHIELD whether she likes it or not.

What happens at SHIELD

My body felt numb, I couldn’t move a muscle. Finally, my eyes opened, and I took in my surroundings; a large lab, with lots of screens. I winced, looking at my bandages arm, the bandage red with dried…

Read more…

blog.name: didanyonesaybuckybarnes
blog.title: Elena, 20, an actual idiot 👌
blog.description:
Total trash. Currently addicted to Poe, Bucky, Reid and like the entirety of the Stranger Things characters. 
Send me a message about anything, I don't bite :)

body:
Bucky x Baker! Reader headcannons

A/N: Ok, so yes, I should be working on that other thing that shall not be named that I promised for today, but instead *drumroll* you get my first attempt at headcannons! Yaaaaay

Pairing: Bucky x Reader

Warning(s): Fluff, finally :)

• You met after a particularly bad mission, when Bucky just wanted to escape the tower and the team and all of that

• But then it started raining

• So of course, he ran into the nearest shop, which so happened to be your bakery

• wooooooow

• And your bakery was just so cute, and it smelt so nice, so Bucky took a seat.

• It took him a second to realize he was getting the entire sofa wet, so he stood back up.

• But that felt awkward

• So he decided he’d buy something

• And then came you

• You were literally the sweetest thing he’d ever seen, you were serving a mom and her kid, and your smile was just adorable

• So he picked up his courage

• And he walked up

• And he ordered a coffee

• A very bitter, very black coffee

• You only smiled, probably cracking some joke about how he needed sugar to heat up, because he was still soaking from the rain.

• So Bucky, taking you completely seriously, dumped an entire pack of sugar in there

• And it was not his cup of tea

• pun very much intended

• You laughed when he spat it out, already having made him a new coffee, and coming out to sit by him after you delivered it.

• And the two of you started chatting

• He found out your name

• He also found out you owned this bakery and had been working here alone for the past year and a half since it opened.

• He didn’t give you his name

• Somehow you got caught up talking to him for what seemed like hours but was actually 10 minutes, but then a customer came in and you had to rush back behind the till.

• Bucky enjoyed his very bitter coffee, and then left without you noticing

• But on the table there was a dollar, and a note saying ‘see you soon, doll.’

• The next day Bucky came again, and you talked for a while more

• He even came behind the till to help you when it got really busy at lunch

• After, you insisted on paying him, but he only smiled

• “It’s okay, doll. I don’t mind.”

• The team couldn’t figure out why Bucky was so happy, or why he left at half ten evry morning and came back at five or six each night.

• Like, what did he do with all that time?

• So Steve, Sam and Nat followed him one day

• But that day was a big day for Bucky

• He was planning to ask you out, and he stopped to buy flowers

• Nat understood first, and so did Sam with some not so subtle hints

• But Steve

• Steve was very confused, was he starting a gardening club? If so, wouldn’t he need seeds or something? Maybe he just liked the smell

• The bakery took all three of them by surprise, because Bucky didn’t do social, and it was pretty busy in there

• He greeted you with a kiss to the forehead, before laying his flowers under the counter and shrugging on the apron to help you

• The bright pink apron

• Sam got some beautiful photos that day

• But then, when most of the crowd had left, save for some regulars, Bucky spotted the three stooges

• And hurried to kick Sam and Steve out

• But Natasha escaped to flirt talk with you

• Bucky shut her down very quickly, shooing her out too

• You asked if those were his friends

• And he very reluctantly said yes, thinking you’d recognise them as avengers and he’d be revealed

• It was a wonder you didn’t know already, he’d been asked about it multiple times by customers, or people on the street outside the bakery

• But instead you offered him the biggest smile, telling him you liked them

• Or at least what you’d seen of them

• Bucky didn’t know he could blush that much

• But he could, apparently

• Then, when cleaning up, you spotted the flowers and asked Bucky about them

• There’s that adorable blush of his again

• So he sort of reluctantly revealed his plans of asking you out

• “They were for you, doll”

• “But for what?”

• “I wanted you to go on a date with me”

• “Yes”

• “…What?”

• “I want to go out on a date with you, too.”

Avengers: Daddy Issues
In which the grandmaster makes an appearance with not-dead Loki;...
body:
The new avengers 4 title released:

Avengers: Daddy Issues

In which the grandmaster makes an appearance with not-dead Loki; nebula beats the shit out of thanos; gamora comes back from the dead and helps, and Tony Stark now has many adopted sciencey children

(maybe Bucky can get his goats back too cause god knows they were his babies to look after)

blog.name: kansou
blog.title: Killer Queen
blog.description: INTP | My preferred pronouns are "your majesty" | Ace&Aro | Philosopher | Scientist | Currently Ironstrange trash.

title: Cap has to die.
body:
Listen,

Remember the time when Cap’s worst nightmare was shown to us in Age of Ultrion? What did he see? 

He saw that there’s nothing for him left; that he can’t “go home” because he sees war even in celebration of the victory (and because he has nothing left, but let’s not dwell on that). Do you really believe that he would ever retire? As long as he’s able to hold his shield, he’ll fight. 

If they want to get rid of Cap, they can’t let him retire. If he has to be gone, he has to die. It’s sad but anything else would be basicially bad writing.

tags: one famous post and now anons start popping out of nowhere
summary: No matter how shitty the movie is if it has marvel in the opening credits you losers will force yourself to love it. HAHAHAA
question: No matter how shitty the movie is if it has marvel in the opening credits you losers will force yourself to love it. HAHAHAA
answer:
You do realise that you sent this to someone who doesn’t love (maybe doesnt even like) Thor:Ragnarok , Captain America movies, Hulk movies, not a huge fan of Doctor Strange movie either,etc.

So…. get your facts straight …. (i would call you a loser but i’m not an asshole..unlike some)

Good day to you sir/mam

So…. get your facts straight …. (i would call you a loser but i’m not an asshole..unlike some)

Good day to you sir/mam

blog.name: marveling-left-and-right
blog.title: Marveling Left and Right
blog.description: On this blog we love and appreciate every MCU character. SPOILER BLOG. ENDGAME SPOILERS WILL BE TAGGED AS #AVENGERS ENDGAME SPOILERS

summary: Before I read "The Death of Captain America", I thought it was weird when Seb said that Cap doesn't die in the movie he[Seb] is...
body: Before I read “The Death of Captain America”, I thought it was weird when Seb said that Cap doesn’t die in the movie he[Seb] is in. In other words, Seb didn’t see him die. But then I read the before mentioned comic and saw that Bucky doesn’t even attend Steve’s funeral. So my theory is Cap dies before they get everyone back from the soul stone and Bucky stays away from the funeral after that for the same reason.

reblog.comment: Before I read “The Death of Captain America”, I thought it was weird when Seb said that Cap doesn’t die in the movie he[Seb] is in. In other words, Seb didn’t see him die. But then I read the before mentioned comic and saw that Bucky doesn’t even attend Steve’s funeral. So my theory is Cap dies before they get everyone back from the soul stone and Bucky stays away from the funeral after that for the same reason.

trail.content_raw: Before I read “The Death of Captain America”, I thought it was weird when Seb said that Cap doesn’t die in the movie he[Seb] is in. In other words, Seb didn’t see him die. But then I read the before mentioned comic and saw that Bucky doesn’t even attend Steve’s funeral. So my theory is Cap dies before they get everyone back from the soul stone and Bucky stays away from the funeral after that for the same reason.
trail.content: Before I read “The Death of Captain America”, I thought it was weird when Seb said that Cap doesn’t die in the movie he[Seb] is in. In other words, Seb didn’t see him die. But then I read the before mentioned comic and saw that Bucky doesn’t even attend Steve’s funeral. So my theory is Cap dies before they get everyone back from the soul stone and Bucky stays away from the funeral after that for the same reason.

title: Spider-Man - Hunt For The Amulet
body:
Tony sends Peter on a mission to Rio De Janeiro to find and recruit a girl named Ava Ayala. But when he gets there, a lot of trouble happens when a power-hungry hunter is after her as well. Follows the MCU Timeline. Takes place a month after The Clash of The Avengers.

New Mission

(Peter’s POV)“Ned…Ned, you there buddy?"I say lightly patting my friend on the cheek."I had a crazy dream,” he groaned,“ We were at your house and Tony Stark was there.” He must’ve been so shocked…

Read more…
